metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: In this chapter you will learn about the following properties:
content.html: In this chapter you will learn about the following properties:

content.text: Add a Decoration Line to Text
The text-decoration-line property is used to add a decoration line to text.
content.html: The text-decoration-line property is used to add a decoration line to text.

content.text: Tip: You can combine more than one value, like overline and underline to display lines both over and under a text.
content.html: Tip: You can combine more than one value, like overline and underline to display lines both over and under a text.

content.code_html:
h1 {
  text-decoration-line: overline;
}

h2 {
  text-decoration-line: line-through;
}

h3 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
}

p {
  text-decoration-line: overline underline;
}

content.text: Note: It is not recommended to underline text that is not a link, as this often confuses the reader.
content.html: Note: It is not recommended to underline text that is not a link, as this often confuses the reader.

content.text: Specify a Color for the Decoration Line
The text-decoration-color property is used to set the color of the decoration line.
content.html: The text-decoration-color property is used to set the color of the decoration line.

content.code_html:
h1 {
  text-decoration-line: overline;
  text-decoration-color: red;
}

h2 {
  text-decoration-line: line-through;
  text-decoration-color: blue;
}

h3 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-color: green;
}

p {
  text-decoration-line: overline underline;
  text-decoration-color: purple;
}

content.text: Specify a Style for the Decoration Line
The text-decoration-style property is used to set the style of the decoration line.
content.html: The text-decoration-style property is used to set the style of the decoration line.

content.code_html:
h1 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-style: solid;
}

h2 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-style: double;
}

h3 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-style: dotted;
}

p.ex1 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-style: dashed;
}

p.ex2 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-style: wavy;
}

p.ex3 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-color: red;
  text-decoration-style: wavy;
}

content.text: Specify the Thickness for the Decoration Line
The text-decoration-thickness property is used to set the thickness of the decoration line.
content.html: The text-decoration-thickness property is used to set the thickness of the decoration line.

syntaxHighlighting.text:
text-decoration-line: underline;  text-decoration-color: red;   
  text-decoration-style: double;  text-decoration-thickness: 5px;

syntax_highlighting.text:
text-decoration-line: underline;  text-decoration-color: red;   
  text-decoration-style: double;  text-decoration-thickness: 5px;

content.code_html:
h1 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-thickness: auto;
}

h2 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-thickness: 5px;
}

h3 {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-thickness: 25%;
}

p {
  text-decoration-line: underline;
  text-decoration-color: red;
  text-decoration-style: double;
  text-decoration-thickness: 5px;
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
text-decoration-line: underline;  text-decoration-color: red;   
  text-decoration-style: double;  text-decoration-thickness: 5px;

content.text: The text-decoration property is a shorthand property for:
content.html: The text-decoration property is a shorthand property for:

content.code_html:
h1 {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

h2 {
  text-decoration: underline red;
}

h3 {
  text-decoration: underline red double;
}

p {
  text-decoration: underline red double 5px;
}

content.text: All links in HTML are underlined by default. Sometimes you see that links are styled with no underline. The text-decoration: none; is used to remove the underline from links, like this:
content.html: All links in HTML are underlined by default. Sometimes you see that links are styled with no underline. The text-decoration: none; is used to remove the underline from links, like this:

content.code_html:
a {
  text-decoration: none;
}

content.text: Exercise ? What is this? Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page

metadata.question: Exercise?What is this?Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page

content.question: Exercise?What is this?Test your skills by answering a few questions about the topics of this page

content.code_html:
Property Description
text-decoration Sets all the text-decoration properties in one declaration
text-decoration-color Specifies the color of the text-decoration
text-decoration-line Specifies the kind of text decoration to be used (underline, overline, etc.)
text-decoration-style Specifies the style of the text decoration (solid, dotted, etc.)
text-decoration-thickness Specifies the thickness of the text decoration line
